name: 2DPlatformer (keithlerner)
description:
2D space-themed platformer

proposed modifications:

  • Bloons tower defense theme
    • player as monkey
    • enemies as balloons
    • wave survival for keys
      • use spawners to spawn waves, sync key spawning with wave completion, allow progression throughout the level to deal with multiple waves in different level areas before reaching the goal
    • new menu UI
  • new mechanic: wall jump
    • allow sticking to walls
    • refresh jump when stuck to a wall
  • new powerup: impulse grenade
    • equip a throwable grenade (down to drop at your feet, up to throw forward)
    • grenade adds force to all entities to push them away from the origin of the explosion
      • can be used to move the player, enemies, pickups
      • may not move doors, the goal, environment pieces (platforms, acid, details)
